## TileDataSource.getTileInfo() method

Get \[\[TileInfo\]\] of a tile.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTileInfo(tileKey: TileKey): Promise<TileInfo | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | Quadtree address of the requested tile. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TileInfo](./harp-datasource-protocol.tileinfo.md) \| undefined&gt;

A promise which will contain the \[\[TileInfo\]\] when resolved.
